name: Mafioso Incognito
description:
NEW YO'K 1943

With New York City under Bugsy Linguine’s tyrant rein, one detective is ready to sacrifice it all for this one pixel perfect shot at taking down the Linguine crime ring once and for all.

CONTROLS:

----------------

Keyboard:

ENTER:  Select on menu

ESCAPE: Toggle fullscreen

WASD:  Movement

CURSOR:  Aiming 

LEFT CLICK:  Shoot

R: Reload 

Controller:

A: Select on menu

LEFT JOYSTICK:  Movement

RIGHT JOYSTICK:  Aiming

RIGHT TRIGGER:  Shoot

RIGHT BUMPER:  Reload

----------------
